title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Skills: Film-Based Systems Thinking and Change Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational change theory and foundational systems thinking comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners analyze interconnectedness of organizational change from a systems thinking perspective and derive at least three influencing factors
Learners present at least two conflict-resolution strategies for stakeholder disputes during change management through film case analysis
Learners conceptualize system change models using visual metaphors and explain them through oral presentations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
